title: App is crashing when trying to share screen/window.
body:
Hi, I installed pre-release  1.12 and app started to crash (not always) when trying to select screen/windows to share.
Probably it was occurring  when I was already sharing smth in the session, then somebody took the screen and I wanted take it back. Not sure 100% that's the only case but this I remembered and it was always during meeting in the work so no time to debug :(
I'm using debian 12 with X11.
Please give me some advices how to start teams (flags to enable logs,change levels), which logs/files deliver etc. to help you investigate problem - unfortunately I got very busy time now and have no time to RTFM :)

Thanks in advance gw.
